name: (island name) Miles!
awardCriteria: Awarded when Nook Miles program is first unlocked

name: Angling for Perfection!
awardCriteria: Number of total fish caught

name: Island Ichthyologist
awardCriteria: Number of unique fish caught

name: Island Togetherness
awardCriteria: Number of days in which you've talked to every one of your villagers

name: You've Got the Bug
awardCriteria: Number of total bugs caught

name: Bugs Don't Bug Me
awardCriteria: Number of unique bugs caught

name: Have a Nice DIY!
awardCriteria: Number of DIY recipes collected

name: DIY Tools
awardCriteria: Number of tools you've crafted

name: DIY Furniture
awardCriteria: Number of furniture pieces you've crafted

name: Furniture Freshener
awardCriteria: Number of times you've customized furniture at a workbench

name: Rough-hewn
awardCriteria: Number of times you've chopped wood from trees

name: Trashed Tools
awardCriteria: Number of tools you've broken

name: Rock-Splitting Champ
awardCriteria: Awarded the first time you get 8 ores/stones from striking a rock

name: Bona Fide Bone Finder!
awardCriteria: Awarded the first time you dig up a fossil

name: Fossil Assessment
awardCriteria: Number of fossils you've had assessed by Blathers

name: Greedy Weeder
awardCriteria: Number of weed clumps you've sold to the shop

name: Flower Power
awardCriteria: Number of flower seeds you've planted (does not count digging up and replanting existing flowers)

name: Flower Tender
awardCriteria: Number of flowers you've watered

name: Tomorrow's Trees Today
awardCriteria: Number of tree saplings you've planted (does not count planting fruits or replanting existing trees)

name: Pick of the Bunch
awardCriteria: Number of fruits you've sold to the shop

name: Fruit Roots
awardCriteria: Awarded for each unique fruit tree you've planted (cherry, orange, pear, peach, apple, and coconut)

name: Shrubbery Hububbery
awardCriteria: Number of shrub starts you've planted (replanting existing shrubs)

name: Go Ahead. Be Shellfish!
awardCriteria: Number of seashells you've sold to the shop

name: Clam and Collected
awardCriteria: Number of clams you've dug up

name: Trash Fishin'
awardCriteria: Number of trash items (cans, tires, or boots) you've fished up

name: Cast Master
awardCriteria: Number of fish you've caught in a single streak without any getting away

name: Dream House
awardCriteria: Number of times you've expanded your home

name: Decorated Decorator
awardCriteria: Awarded the first time you get an "S" ranking from the HHA

name: Hoard Reward
awardCriteria: Number of furniture pieces you've placed in your house

name: Good Things in Store!
awardCriteria: Number of items you've placed in your home storage

name: Remarkable Remodeler
awardCriteria: Number of times you've remodeled the outside appearance of your home

name: Smile Isle
awardCriteria: Number of villager requests you've fulfilled (such as returning lost items)

name: Reaction Ruler
awardCriteria: Number of reactions you've learned

name: Island Shutterbug
awardCriteria: Awarded the first time you take a photo using the camera app on the NookPhone (screenshot button does not count, must use the app)

name: Edit Credit
awardCriteria: Awarded the first time you edit your Passport (title, comment, or photo)

name: NookPhone Life
awardCriteria: Awarded after the 10th time you open your NookPhone

name: That's One Smart Phone
awardCriteria: Awarded after the 1000th time you open your NookPhone

name: Shop to It
awardCriteria: Number of times you've ordered from the Nook Shopping catalog

name: Growing Collection
awardCriteria: Number of unique furniture pieces you've added to your catalog

name: Nook Miles for Miles!
awardCriteria: Number of Nook Miles+ goals you've completed

name: First-Time Buyer
awardCriteria: Awarded the first time you purchase an item from a shop

name: Seller of Unwanted Stuff
awardCriteria: Awarded the first time you sell and item to a shop

name: Moving Fees Paid!
awardCriteria: Awarded when you pay off your initial loan using Nook Miles

name: Bell Ringer
awardCriteria: Number of total bells you've spent in shops

name: Miles for Stalkholders
awardCriteria: Awarded the first time you purchase turnips

name: Cornering the Stalk Market
awardCriteria: Number of total bells you've profited from selling turnips

name: No More Loan Payments!
awardCriteria: Awarded after paying off your first house loan with bells

name: Bulletin-Board Benefit
awardCriteria: Awarded the first time you post a message on your town bulletin board

name: Popular Pen Pal
awardCriteria: Number of letters you've sent

name: Flea Flicker
awardCriteria: Number of times you've caught fleas off a villager

name: Cicada Memories
awardCriteria: Awarded the first time you catch a cicada shell

name: Netting Better!
awardCriteria: Awarded the first time you catch five wasps in a row without running away or getting stung

name: Pit-y Party!
awardCriteria: Awarded the first time you bury a pitfall seed

name: Taking the Sting Out
awardCriteria: Awarded the first time you get stung by a wasp

name: Faint of Heart
awardCriteria: Awarded the first time you get knocked out by a Scorpion or Tarantula

name: Overcoming Pitfalls
awardCriteria: Awarded the first time you fall into a pitfall hole

name: Faked Out!
awardCriteria: Donated a fake piece of art

name: Lost Treasure
awardCriteria: Awarded the first time a balloon present you shot lands in a body of water

name: It's Raining Treasure!
awardCriteria: Number of balloons you've shot down with a slingshot

name: Fun with Fences
awardCriteria: Awarded the first time you place a fence

name: Snowmaestro
awardCriteria: Number of perfect snow-people you've built

name: Wishes Come True
awardCriteria: Number of shooting stars you've wished on.

name: Exterior Decorator
awardCriteria: Awarded the first time you place some furniture outside

name: (island name) Icons
awardCriteria: Awarded for changing your town tune and island flag for the first time

name: Island Designer
awardCriteria: Awarded the first time you use the Island Designer app to place a path, add/remove water, and build/destroy a cliff

name: Wispy Island Secrets
awardCriteria: Number of times you've helped Wisp find the parts of his spirit

name: Gulliver's Travails
awardCriteria: Number of times you've helped Gulliver fix his communicator

name: K.K. Mania
awardCriteria: Number of K.K. shows you've attended

name: True Patron of the Arts
awardCriteria: Number of times you purchased art that turned out to be real

name: True Friends
awardCriteria: Number of villagers you've become good friends with

name: Birthday Celebration
awardCriteria: Number of villager birthdays you've attended

name: Happy Birthday!
awardCriteria: Awarded the first time you play on your character's birthday

name: Fishing Tourney!
awardCriteria: Awarded the first time you attend a fishing tourney in each season

name: Bug-Off!
awardCriteria: Awarded the first time you attend a bug-off tourney in each season

name: Countdown Celebration
awardCriteria: Awarded for attending the new year holiday event

name: Making a Change
awardCriteria: Awarded the first time you use a wardrobe to change your character's outfit

name: First Custom Design!
awardCriteria: Awarded the first time you use the Custom Design app to edit or create a design

name: Custom Design Pro!
awardCriteria: Awarded the first time you use the Custom Design pro app to edit or create a design

name: Paydirt!
awardCriteria: Awarded the first time you dig up bells from a shining spot

name: Shady Shakedown
awardCriteria: Number of furniture pieces you've found from shaking trees

name: Golden Milestone
awardCriteria: Awarded for each unique golden tool you've equipped (shovel, net, fishing rod, watering can, axe, and slingshot)

name: Island and Yourland
awardCriteria: Number of times you've visited another player's island (does not count mystery islands using Nook Miles Tickets)

name: Host the Most
awardCriteria: Number of other players that have visited your island

name: Active Island Resident
awardCriteria: Number of total unique days you've played the game
